verses.name: Ezekiel 23:44
verses.text: Yet they went in unto her, as they go in unto a woman that playeth the harlot: so went they in unto Aholah and unto Aholibah, the lewd women.

verses.name: Ezekiel 23:45
verses.text: And the righteous men, they shall judge them after the manner of adulteresses, and after the manner of women that shed blood; because they are adulteresses, and blood is in their hands.

verses.name: Ezekiel 23:46
verses.text: For thus saith the Lord God; I will bring up a company upon them, and will give them to be removed and spoiled.
